sinobrush.advancement.brush.desc:
Sketching those features onto the paper
Not distinguishing between fairness or homeliness
sinobrush.advancement.brush.name: Writing on the paper
sinobrush.advancement.fan.description:
传说，说书人深湖在 TeaCon 演讲时就用过这把扇子
他浪迹天地，无长剑在手
三寸惊堂木，将故事传颂
sinobrush.advancement.fan.name: 踏遍山海
sinobrush.advancement.root.desc:
The painting that used color to depict all walks of life,
while retained black and white to render the beauty of ages.
sinobrush.advancement.root.name: SinoBrush
sinobrush.advancement.unfold_fan.descrip: 此展折扇，此任平生不惧风与雪
sinobrush.advancement.unfold_fan.name: 侠肝义胆
sinobrush.description.folded_fan.wrote: 一把折扇，上面写着一些字
